text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

(Alright, I can wait for a response on this matter now...
Next is...)

(The review of this proposal... is until today...
Alright...!)

...Alright!
Finished.

Oh, you look tired~...
Phew~
Haha, looks like you were bored, huh?

Yeah~. The lesson from the previous period
just wouldn't end~, so I was bored~...

Oh, by the way~. Since work is over,
does that mean it's break time?

Well, yeah.
...It's like, want to hang out to kill time?
Bingo~
Haha, that's the spirit.

Yay~. So, then~...
What should we do~?

Oh, I remember!
Something crazy happened the other day~
Oh, what's that?

I was doing homework, and suddenly I was like, "I want
something sweet!" So I went to the kitchen at home!
I see.

Then there happened to be strawberry-flavored candies!
I thought, "Nice!" and ate one~
It was sour!
Ah... Could it be...

That's right! It was the plum-flavored one!
And it was really intense! I was like, "Ah~!"
That sounds like a disaster.

It was! By the way,
does the Producer ever have similar experiences?
No, not particularly──

──Well, I don't mean that, so it's okay.
Got any interesting stories~?

Huh...!
Hmm... let me think... Oh!
Oh, something happened~?

You know those wireless earphones, right?
The small ones.
Ah, those convenient ones~

Yeah, because they're small and light, they're easy
to carry around, they have quite a few advantages.

But, there's a huge drawback.
Guess what it is?

Uh, what's that~
I've never used them, so I have no idea~

They're easy to lose. I even
lost them at home the other day.

Seriously!?
Did you find them!?
Yeah, surprisingly, they were in a place that even surprised me.
Where!?

...Around my neck, I had them on, but I didn't realize it...
...Because they're so light.

Haha! That's crazy!
Haha, yeah...!

W,Well...!
I'm glad...!

Anything else~? Producer's stories
are seriously interesting, so I want to hear more~!
